name: RUNE OS
description:
A runescaped inspired terminal based game!

It a kind of mix between modern systems and old text based adventure style.

This is my first real game and is in VERY early access. You can expect to see lots of updates (When im in the mood).

Kill enemys in a big combat system with perks and downsides on what way you choose to fight your opponents, level up skills with XP scaling based on what your doing to reward doing tough work, mine with more ores coming soon, fish and make good money by selling it, cook, do missions for rewards and all that good stuff.

Im still working on developing a storyline and making the game more fun!

You can expect to see at least 1 update a week if your interested.

Im working on a lot of quests with dialogue, im making duzends of enemys and working on a more fleshed out story to uncover by doing quests and killing monsters!

Work on climbing to the top of the levels and beating every enemy, miniboss or GOD the game can throw at you (In the future lol).

Disclaimer: These features ARE in the game though their still being worked on being expanded and do currently suck  but their still being updated.
